# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)3rdparty/
(?:^|/)go\.sum$
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$
(?:^|/)vendor/
\.a$
\.acl$
\.ai$
\.all-contributorsrc$
\.avi$
\.bmp$
\.bz2$
\.cat$
\.cer$
\.class$
\.coveragerc$
\.crt$
\.csr$
\.dll$
\.docx?$
\.drawio$
\.DS_Store$
\.eot$
\.exe$
\.gif$
\.git-blame-ignore-revs$
\.gitattributes$
\.gitkeep$
\.graffle$
\.gz$
\.icns$
\.ico$
\.ipynb$
\.jar$
\.jks$
\.jpe?g$
\.key$
\.lib$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mo$
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.o$
\.ocf$
\.otf$
\.p12$
\.parquet$
\.pdf$
\.pem$
\.pfx$
\.png$
\.psd$
\.pyc$
\.pylintrc$
\.qm$
\.s$
\.so$

\.sys$
\.tar$
\.tiff?$
\.ttf$
\.wav$
\.webm$
\.webp$
\.woff2?$
\.xlsx?$
\.zip$
^client/3rd/
^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qclient/server_scripts/dns/configure_container.sh\E$
^\Qclient/server_scripts/ipsec/start.sh\E$
^\Qclient/server_scripts/sftp/configure_container.sh\E$
^\Qdeploy/data/linux/client/bin/ck-client\E$
^\Qdeploy/data/linux/client/bin/ss-local\E$
